title: Quick Tethering Fire
summary: Smart way to Tethering without operate on Smart phone.
developerAddress: 福岡県福岡市中央区薬院3丁目13-11　サナガリアーノビル6F
description: We want to internet soon when want to use a Laptop or Tablet at out such as the lounge, cafe, Air port and train.We can connect to the Internet with tethering of the smartphone, but it is troublesome to first take out the smartphone from bag, next unlock the phone, finally open setting, and tap.Tethering Fire allows you to quickly start tethering by the Smart watche.You can keep your smartphone in your pocket or bag.You can control tethering of the smartphone by Android Wear and SONY Smart watch 2.You can also check the state of tethering, so you can also prevent that the battery drain the battery of the smartphone.Of course you can also operate tethering from phone's home screen widgets or app.Note: Please make sure that the smartphone and the mobile plan correspond to tethering in advance.Tethering fire corresponds to the following functions.Smart Connect extension for SmartWatch 2.Apps for Android Wear.Home screen.Traditional app.
descriptionHTML:
We want to internet soon when want to use a Laptop or Tablet at out such as the lounge, cafe, Air port and train.

We can connect to the Internet with tethering of the smartphone, but it is troublesome to first take out the smartphone from bag, next unlock the phone, finally open setting, and tap.

Tethering Fire allows you to quickly start tethering by the Smart watche.
You can keep your smartphone in your pocket or bag.

You can control tethering of the smartphone by Android Wear and SONY Smart watch 2.
You can also check the state of tethering, so you can also prevent that the battery drain the battery of the smartphone.

Of course you can also operate tethering from phone's home screen widgets or app.

Note: Please make sure that the smartphone and the mobile plan correspond to tethering in advance.

Tethering fire corresponds to the following functions.
Smart Connect extension for SmartWatch 2.
Apps for Android Wear.
Home screen.
Traditional app.
comments: This app works perfectly for me on my OPPO R9plus. It saves me having to go to settings to tether my laptop each day. Really good app. Thanks!
It doesn't work to enable tethering on my original Pixel (running Android 8.0) and my Fossil Q Explorist (running Android Wear 2.5).
My Fn thought's Please don't make a app that will show Wi-Fi but not let any one connection to it dumb aszzzzzzzzzz
